casa.seoDescription: Restored and customized by the artist Giuseppe Marini Wenter
casa.h2: Restored and customized by the artist Giuseppe Marini Wenter
p: Nestled in the green hills toward the Mezzane Valley, on the edge of the center of St. Peter.
Part of ancient rustic complex of 700 (former ancient inn), facing new subdivision prestigious residential census in NCU the municipality of Lavagno (VR) part 324 sheet 11.
Plans ground, first and second tot. 10 rooms covering an area of ​​about 340 square meters. (310 Functional).
One owner, already the subject of rehabilitation and restoration of functional integration population of 1983, possible extension of restoration, immediately habitable.
And 'the end of the rustic farmhouse with views on 3 sides:
• on the ground floor: large entrance hall with staircase prospicente, terracotta tiled floor, small cellar with entrance to the medium;

• First floor: living room with terrazzo floors patterned, large terrace of 30 sqm.; stairway to the second floor with wood paneling; ceiling with exposed beams painted with geometric motifs, kitchen with fireplace, large bathroom with ceramic floor end, 1 bedroom with parquet floor;

• Second floor: bright and attic (average height 2.36 meters - 2.98 meters maximum) paneling with exposed beams treated and painted over the entire range, living room, 2-3 bedrooms, bathroom, hardwood floors, carpeted , colored rubber;
• heating and modular;
• garage or any other on the left side is not restored;
• stone facade.
Stayed in Rovereto and Trento, taking an interest in artistic movements, participating in cultural circles and research groups local art.
After moving to Brussels in the 70s he took courses in painting, drawing and printmaking at the Academie Royale des Beaux-Arts led by major international artists.
He has developed and works called IPOTESI e PROPOSTE, VERIFICA di IPOTESI, SENSAZIONI and more later.
Signed in 'autumn of 1976 Il manifesto Astrazione Oggettiva with Aldo Schmid, Luigi Senesi, Mauro Cappelletti, Diego Mazzonelli, Gianni Pellegrini.
Activity:
dal 1963 in esposizioni collettive e personali organizzate da Circoli Culturali e Organismi rappresentativi, Enti pubblici e Gallerie con edizioni di grafica esclusiva a cura della SELECTA srl.
Trade shows and exhibitions:
• to Riykcentrum Frans Masereel - Ministerie van Nederlandse Cultuur - Kasterlee
• to 'Italian Cultural Institute in Brussels
• Italian Cultural Institute in Amsterdam
• he Commission des Communautes Européennes - Europa Club Overijse
• His works are in private and public collections
• acquisitions of the Bibliothèque Royale de Belgique Albert 1
• Ministere de l'Education Nationale de Belgique

zona.seoTitle: Rustic copyright in the area of Verona
zona.h1: Rustic copyright in the area of Verona
p: In position easily accessible by public road:
• 3.5 km (6 min) tangential exit south of Verona
• 6 km (10 minutes) motorway exit Verona South (A4 Milan-Venice)
• 16 km (20 minutes) Verona center
• 42 km (35 minutes) Peschiera and Lake Garda
• 50 km (35 minutes) Vicenza center
• 100 km Venice
• 150 km Dolomites
